tool_description: An API showing all the current Premier League Players
name: Premier League Players
title: Premier League Players

api_list.name: Get Players
api_list.description: Returns a list of all the current premier league players. Query parameters for team and nation can also be used to filter the list (Ex. /players?team=arsenalfc&nation=england)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://premier-league-players1.p.rapidapi.com/players"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "premier-league-players1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://premier-league-players1.p.rapidapi.com/players"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "premier-league-players1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
